footer.address: No. 20-1, Sanlong Street, Shulin District, New Taipei City 238, Taiwan
footer.intro: Supplier of insulation materials, conductive fabrics, etc.

index.intro:
Yuan Long Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. was established in 2005, owned by the Far Eastern Group, with an annual production capacity of 130,000 tons of cold-rolled stainless steel, and products sold to over 40 countries worldwide.
➤ With Taiwan as its base, Yuan Long demonstrates impressive strength in the global metal processing industry market.
➤ Yuan Long fully implements a quality management system, embodying the spirit of continuous improvement, constantly enhancing quality and productivity, with products deeply trusted and recognized by customers.
➤ Yuan Long aims to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050, implementing various energy management measures to take practical actions in energy conservation and carbon reduction, contributing to the sustainability of the planet.

application.intro: Liyun constantly innovates technology and actively researches and develops high-quality insulation materials, conductive fabrics, conductive fabric foam, foam, fireproof adhesive tapes, absorbing materials, and conductive copper foil, etc. It adds the latest technology production equipment to produce a series of precise specifications, ultra-high quality, and user-friendly products, establishing a good reputation in the industry.

companyIntro.title: Company Introduction
companyIntro.phase1: Founded in 1987, as a world leading Auxiliary materials、consumables designer and manufacturer, ，Li Yun Enterprise Co., Ltd. is committed to providing Insulation 、 Conductive total solutions for electronic 、 electrical and other major industries.
companyIntro.phase2: Listening to the needs of customers, Li Yun Enterprise is doing research and the most advanced technologies continuously and providing a variety of conductive、insulating products for variety industries. They include, but are not limited to: electronic communications、network communications、 industrial computers、POS、automotive electronics、vehicles, energy、battery、medical、semiconductor, etc.

companyPhliosophy.title: Business Philosophy
companyPhliosophy.phase1: LI YUN ENTERPRISE is doing research and the most advanced technologies continuously, upgrade the equipment as well. Then, we manufacture Insulation Materials、Conductive Fabric、EMI Shielding Gasket、Sponge、Fire Barrier Tape、Absorber and conductive Copper Foil that with exact specification、the high quality also easy to use. Build up the reputation in Field.

companyValue.title: Create Higher Added Value for Customers
companyValue.phase1: LI YUN ENTERPRISE is an ISO 9001 qualified manufacturer. You may find the product you need in our website. Also, we focus on the Custom-made product with special design/specification/properties/material and our product compliance RoHS、REACH and UL. If you have any questions, welcome to contact us in anytime.

companyProduct.phase1: Liyun Enterprise Co., Ltd. produces a series of precise specifications, high-quality products. And with the latest technology production equipment, we can accept customer commissions to design and manufacture products with special specifications and characteristics.

phase2.title: UL Fire Barrier Tape compliant UL94 VTM-0
phase2.content: UL Fire Barrier Tape compliant UL with good at resistance chemical solvent applied on Insulation for Electronic、 Electrical components, with a variety of colors.

phase3.title: Special Insulation material and foaming material
phase3.content: Insulation/foaming material with better on sealing、insulation and EMI Shielding is suitable on Power Supply、Hard Disk Drive、TV and Security cameras、Printed Circuit Board、Laptop and various business machines.

phase4.title: Conductive Material、Conductive Fabric and Copper/Aluminum Foil
phase4.content: We provide various of metal conduction product, such as Copper Foil、Aluminum Foil and Alloy copper. Also, we have Conductive Fabric、Conductive gasket、conductive adhesive as well.

phase5.title: Design and Manufacture Insulation Material compliant UL applied in electronics and electric appliance

phase6.title: Copper (Aluminum) Foil Back Adhesive Processing, Manufacturing

phase7.title: Absorber
phase7.content: EMC and suppress the internal noise of RF are the best solutions in wireless and high frequency epoch.

phase8.title: Metal Conduction Antenna、EMI、Nickel Plate cladding
phase8.content: Copper Foil、Aluminum Foil、Alloy copper and Nickel sheet.

rba.title: RBA
rba.content:
RESPONSIBLE BUSINESS ALLIANCE CODE OF CONDUCT
The Responsible Business Alliance (RBA), formerly the Electronic Industry Citizenship Coalition (EICC), Code of Conduct establishes standards to ensure that working conditions in the electronics industry or industries in which electronics is a key component and its supply chains are safe, that workers are treated with respect and dignity, and that business operations are environmentally responsible and conducted ethically.

workerPolicy.title: Human rights policy of labors
workerPolicy.content:
Li Yun will notify our employees about their human rights, including the basic laws and regulations. We established effective multi-communication mechanisms, wages, and benefits. We offer multi-training opportunities, eliminate forced labor to promote the freely chosen employment. In accordance with Labor Standards Act, 
Li Yun has abolished child laborers, supporting the physical and psychological well-being of minor laborers. For our employees, we provide annual training and notify employees of their rights by company website and email, to make sure our employees fully understand the contents and the spirit of the RBA policy.

moralPolicy.title: Ethics policy
moralPolicy.content: Li Yun ’s employees are forbidden to do any illegal business activities and shall avoid conflicts of interests, accept a personal commission, rebate or any benefits inappropriate in any way.

enviromentPolicy.title: Environmental health and safety policy
enviromentPolicy.phase1: Li Yun promotes environmental management and is committed to providing a healthy and good working environment for our employees.

moralMineral.title: Sourcing policy for conflict mineral
moralMineral.content: We do not use or work with suppliers who source conflict minerals such as, Tin(Sn), tantalum(Ta), tungsten(W), gold(Au) from the Democratic Republic of Congo or any illegal mining activities. We request our suppliers sign the “Conflict Minerals Reporting Template (CMRT)”, ”Declaration of Metal Conflict-Free”, and ”Letter of commitment of supplier for RBA”, making sure our sourcing satisfies the laws and regulations and satisfies our customers request.

hsf.title: HSF Policy
hsf.content: Li Yun acts on the promotion of green purchasing policy, environmental protection, comply with the required of customers and laws and regulations.
